instructions.name: add_segmenter
docs: Allows the admin to add a new segmenter to a registry

instructions.name: change_admin
docs: Allows the admin to appoint a new admin

accounts.name: payer
docs: The payer for the registry account creation

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initializes the deployment with an admin

instructions.name: remove_segmenter
docs: Allows the admin to remove an existing segmenter from a registry

errors.name: DuplicateEntry
errors.msg: Segmenter already exists in the registry

errors.name: InvalidAdminSpecified
errors.msg: The admin specified is not authorized to invoke this instruction

types.name: Config
docs: The global config for the registry.

fields.name: admin
docs: The public key of the account that has permission to modify the Registry accounts.

types.name: Registry
docs: The registry account stores a mapping of registered segmenter accounts
